alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Rankin; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 8:29PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rankin, northwestern Simpson and Copiah Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Farmhaven to near Goshen Springs to near Jackson to near Dry Grove. Movement was south at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jackson, Pearl and Flowood around 835 PM CDT. Richland around 840 PM CDT. Brandon, Crystal Springs, Florence, Dentville and Monterey around 845 PM CDT. Hazlehurst, Star, Leesburg, Whites and Gallman around 850 PM CDT. Pelahatchie and Glancy around 855 PM CDT. Cato, Johns, Harrisville, Hopewell and Piney Woods around 900 PM CDT. Union around 905 PM CDT. Mendenhall around 910 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include D`Lo, Braxton, Puckett and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and southwestern Mississippi.
